properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 4:03AM EST until January 17 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Increased lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Huron, Sanilac and St. Clair Counties.

* WHEN...Today and tonight until 6 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Onshore or alongshore wind and high waves intensify
flooding of prone areas along the lakeshore.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... West to northwest wind today shifts toward
the north and increases speed tonight. This brings high waves
closer to the Lake Huron shoreline leading to intensified
lakeshore flooding late today through tonight.
properties.instruction:
Residents on or near the shore should take appropriate action to
protect property from high waves and rising water levels.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST FRIDAY
